author: Unicorn Vic

comment: I sort of rarely follow the Depp/ Heard news, but I’m here for Benoist. The thing I find scary is that there’s a legion of incels and MAGAs fully on board with their self-serving agenda to hate women/ not believing female victims and support male abusers ( Heather Morris, example) like Blake Jenner for practically blinding Melissa. And again,  I don’t know what the Depp/ Heard story is but I presume it’s the same; men and women supporting this hateful bigoted ideology that majority of women are the abusers to further their agenda. Don’t get me wrong,  They support men whom are abused, then it’s great, I support it, but do they support women that are abused too and believe them? Absolutely not, because they say: “ women are mostly domestic abusers to  men”  (which is false) and make all sorts of over the top falsehoods that demonized women. I hope women will continue to fight for injustice and bias. Yes, women can abuse too but majority it’s likely men That are the perpetrators.
author: Kay GEe

Our Support Petition for Amber was Hidden from Search for Change's database for possibly months now. Search via Keywords on their platform has been restored after inquiry... 
Meanwhile, read Zhang's whistleblower report of 100s of thousands of bots purchased to harm political adversaries. This is done with webscraping and machine learning.

https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/craigsilverman/facebook-ignore-political-manipulation-whistleblower-memo
After Amber WON and validated by the judge, they've increased sign ups, which is nonsensical without media and legality being on her side. Signatures, reviews (including IMDb where they harassed female public figures in movies), likes, etc can all be purchased online... Women's Equality is political online, with figures like Melinda Gates getting 900+ dislikes to Hide From Search & Hide from Recommendations with only 6K views.

comment:
#SaveLives #911 - For years, Amber Heard – Mera in Aquaman, a Human Rights Champion for the United Nations, humanitarian, and Women’s Rights Ambassador to the ACLU – has been harassed, cyber abused, threatened, and faced hate online for speaking out against abuse in society.

What people don’t know is that Amber data-collected the abuse against her with technology before 911 systems could collect real-time data from applications.

Read the article: 
Amber Heard’s Story of Cyber Abuse Inspires Change to Public Safety to Save Lives - https://www.truehollywoodtalk.com/amber-heards-story-cyberabuse-inspires-change-public-safety-save-lives/

911 cannot even locate with data to know where a caller is or use text info (https://SaveMeNowApp.es). 

She did this before the European #Innovation Council and Swedish govt supported creating a cell phone application (BrightAct) that was founded during COVID-19 to streamline services, reporting, and Data-Collecting for Domestic Abuse victims. 

Amber Heard took photos, texts, recordings, and evidence using her cell phone before it was culturally accepted.

Most women will never make backups of their texts, or store years of photos and recordings, not until culture has changed.

Society is not only not-victim-centered to tell women to protect themselves; it isn’t proactive to tell us to help victims.

We need to do more to improve and save lives.
author: Motivator Network

comment:
Oct 23, 2020: Victory for Amber - Opposition lawyer Adam Waldman was removed from the 2nd case Virginia, USA by the Judge.
This is long overdue with how Waldman threatened witnesses and utilizes social media that, as proven, is biased to approve of male public figures over female figures - allowing women's exploited images, verifying women less, threatening female reporters and politicians more often, and allowing hateful imposter accounts of women to be created.

"Heard had moved for sanctions against the Washington attorney last month, contending that the press leaks happened “on at least two occasions.”

She said Waldman was responsible for disseminating audio recordings, surveillance pictures and declarations from third-party witnesses to websites and Twitter users, “leading readers and potential jurors to believe that these declarations are somehow official case documents, which they are not.”

White, who is chief judge of the 19th Circuit, agreed Friday to revoke Waldman’s pro hac vice status. Despite finding that ethical standards were violated, the judge declined to issue a gag order against Waldman." 
https://www.courthousenews.com/lawyer-for-johnny-depp-kicked-off-case-after-press-leaks/
author: Motivator Network
